name: The Cube of World
description:
Improve the basic attributes of heroes, mainly increasing the maximum health and talent skills of heroes; On the one hand, it increases the player's error tolerance rate, and on the other hand, it makes the hero's characteristics more obvious
Equipment is mainly provided with armor, armor damaged in battle cannot be recovered, and a uniform payment for the maintenance of equipment before exploration can be paid.
Killing monsters has a chance to obtain genetic fragments of enemies, and accumulating a certain amount of fragments can increase the awareness of such enemies, thereby increasing the damage to them. When the recognition level reaches a certain requirement, a few kills of this monster will have a probability of dropping rare materials
developers: 海南掌跃科技有限公司
publishers: 海南掌跃科技有限公司
